pages.text: Dang ta lia zou guoqu de shihou, ta dui ta de tongpu shuo:`Na zaofan lai chi! Women queshi pijuanle.'

Ta shuo:`Ni gaosu wo ba, dang women daoda na zuo panshi xia xiuxi de shihou,(wo jiujing shi zenyang de ne?) Wo que yi wangjile na wei yu——zhi yin emo wo cai wangjile gaosu ni,——na wei yu yi ruhai er qu, na zhenshi guaishi!'
Ta shuo:`Zhe zheng shi women suo xunqiu de.'Ta lia jiu yi lai shi de zuji zhuanshen huiqu.
Ta lia faxian wo de yige pu ren, wo yi ba cong wo zheli fachu de enhui shangci ta, wo yi ba cong wo zheli fachu de zhishi chuanshou ta.
Mu sa dui ta shuo:`Wo yao zhuisui ni, xiwang ni ba ni suo xue de de zhengdao chuanshou wo. Hao ma?'
Ta shuo:`Ni buneng naixin di he wo zai yiqi.
Ni meiyou chedi renshi de shiqing ni zenme neng renshou ne?'
Mu sa shuo:`Ruguo zhenzhu yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi jianren de, bu hui weikang ni de renhe mingling.'
Ta shuo:`Ruguo ni zhuisui wo, namo,(yu shi) buyao wen wo shenme daoli, deng wo ziji jiang gei ni ting.'

Ta lia jiu tongxing, daole cheng chuan de shihou, ta ba chuan zaole yige dong, mu sa shuo:`Ni ba chuan zaole yige dong, yao xiang shi chuan li de ren yan si ma? Ni que yi zuole yi jian beimiu de shi!'
Ta shuo:`Wo meiyou dui ni shuoguo ma? Ni buneng naixin he wo zai yiqi.'
Mu sa shuo:`Gangcai wo wangle ni de zhufu, qing ni buyao zebei wo, buyao yi wo suo danan de shi zebei wo!'
Ta lia you tongxing, houlai yujianle yige er tong, ta jiu ba nage er tong shale, mu sa shuo:`Ni zenme wang sha wugu de ren ne? Ni que yi zuole yi jian xiong'e de shile!'
